---
title: "covid"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(dplyr)
library(tidyr)
```

```{r}
covid = read.csv("covid.csv")
```

```{r}
colnames(covid) = c("date", "county", "state", "fips", "cases", "deaths")

covidSubset = covid %>% 
  subset(,select = c(date, cases, deaths)) 

covidSubset['country'] = 'United States'

covidTidy = covidSubset %>%
  mutate(mortalityRate = deaths/cases)
```
